_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Characteristics of a learned memorizer o: Understands the meaning and the text of even a four-line verse
Practices in line with that teaching
Characteristics of a learned person with: Sees the meaning of "This is suffering" with penetrating wisdom
Sees the meaning of "This is the origin of suffering" with penetrating wisdom
Sees the meaning of "This is the cessation of suffering" with penetrating wisdom
Sees the meaning of "This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering" with penetrating wisdom
Characteristics of an astute person with: Has no intention to hurt themselves
Has no intention to hurt others
Has no intention to hurt both
Thinks only of the benefit for themselves
Thinks only of the benefit for others
Thinks only of the benefit for both
Thinks only of the benefit for the whole world.
